open.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Vumatel Villages network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologise for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Vumatel engineers are investigating the issue. We will provide further feedback as soon as received. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
